message: Let's be fair, Bob. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor to start negotiations.
I think a 55/45 split is a more balanced starting point.  Let's see if we can agree on that.
Bob, time is money, and money is losing value. I'll agree to your 55/45 split, but in my favor this time.
Let's split the money evenly.  It's the fairest option at this point.
